item.description:
When: October 18 & 19, time TBA
Where: International Business School (IBS)
Mail Stop - MS 032
Lemberg Academic Center
Brandeis University
415 South Street
Waltham, MA 02454-9110
Website and Register: www.neibc.org
Join us for a two-day summit presenting 12 of the most promising Israeli life sciences companies. The event will feature individual corporate presentations, workshops on timely subjects, one-on-one arranged meetings and reception and dinner with key corporate and government officials. The keynote speaker for the event is Aaron Ciechanover, the 2004 Nobel Prize Laureate. For more information please call 617-610-0077.
item.name: New England Israel Business Council (NEIBC) Second Annual Life Sciences Summit
